thread.title: Greatest Dots Challenging Dot-to-Dot Puzzles Available on the Apple App Store.
thread.title_full: Greatest Dots Challenging Dot-to-Dot Puzzles Available on the Apple App Store. - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Greatest Dots Challenging Dot-to-Dot Puzzles Available on the Apple App Store.
text:
An app that is a natural extension of Monkeying Aroundâ€™s (18) award winning "Greatest Dot-to-Dot Books," revolutionizing the dot-to-dot world with challenging, artistic, and addicting puzzles since 2000.
Rochester, NY (PRWEB) October 09, 2015
Available today, the Greatest Dots app features challenging and artistic dot-to-dot puzzles for older children and adult iPhone, iPad and iPod Touch users. The variety of dot-to-dot styles are a great teaching tool for kids, letting them have fun while they learn, and adults and seniors will love it because it is a fun stress reliever that also keeps the brain active.
In the Greatest Dots app there are six different styles of doing a dot-to-dot puzzle. Each puzzle is direct from the pages of the Greatest Newspaper Dot-to-Dot book series by David Kalvitis (except for 2 new hidden bonus puzzles). Use your finger like a pen to draw crisp clean lines between numbered dots. Each line drawn snaps to the dots with a satisfying click and straightens your line for the most precisely detailed rendering possible. You will create artistic pictures covering a broad subject range, adding to the surprise element. Each final image is a small treasure, beautifully drawn and charming. Collect pen colors and paper colors for unique and colorful combinations. A nostalgic relaxing pastime finally done right for iPhone, iPad and iPod Touch users of all ages.
The Greatest Dots app is available for FREE in the Apple App Store, with in-app purchases.
To join the revolution please visit http://www.MonkeyingAround.com for more Greatest Dots information, screen shots, videos and challenging dot-to-dots.
In 2000, Monkeying Around started a dot-to-dot revolution, producing award-winning dot-to-dot puzzles. Author/artist, David Kalvitis, has been dedicated to creating the most amazingly complex and artistic dot-to-dot puzzles to ever hit the market. These dot-to-dot puzzles aren't just for little kids and here's why: The final image cannot be determined until completion of the puzzle; puzzles can number in the thousands; and there are 17 different ways of completing these dot-to-dot puzzles. David Kalvitis's puzzles challenge children and adults of all ages, are an incredible learning tool, and are a fantastic way to relieve stress. With nearly 1 million Greatest Dot-to-Dot Books sold worldwide, Monkeying Around and David Kalvitis continue to strive to make connecting and coloring dot-to-dots a wonderfully enjoyable and relaxing experience.
###
For more information about the Greatest Dots app or Monkeying Around and David Kalvitis, please contact:
